If you are a fan of quick zombie killing fun then this is the game for you! Every map is a new adventure with the Zombies and Infected always spawning in different areas keeping you on your toes even on maps you may know well!
Muito bom, para os jogadores raizes ou da nova gera√ß√£o.

Pain and suffering, 10/10 best "broken" game I know of.
DLC are a must but not in the terms of the infamous Europa Universalis 4 with $200 worth of DLC adding stuff that should have been in the game from the get go.
Don't you love when Yugoslavia has atomic tech in 1936? So do I!
The game holds up graphically even 13 years after release which is amazing.
Puedo patear gente gorda el juego
Empece a jugar el juego de among us,pense que iba a ganar pero me mataron,el juego es muy entretenido,pero me mata siempre el asesino.
Es divertido jugar con gente random v:

A forgotten game overshadowed by its sequel Left 4 Dead 2. Pretty hard to believe it's been over a decade.

I still come back to this game every now and then, and it still feels great. Good UI, nice fast paced gameplay, and tons of fun with friends.

Though Left 4 Dead 2 contains all of the maps and characters included in L4D1, it's still nice to come back to this every once in a while for some old-school fun.
classic, lots of pew pew pew, lots or rawrr zombie, whats not to like?
Classic game that holds up. Well worth the $10 price.

This cant be good for me, but i feel great

Although i only as of this review have 6 hours of this game on steam (PC), i have in fact easily played 500+ hours of this game on console specifically Xbox 360. Funny enough this game was the sole reason why i wanted an Xbox as a kid and honestly i don't regret it. This game was a golden age game for me and even to this day is still more than fun to play, even if you should probably get Left 4 Dead 2 as it is this but more stuff.

Some Notes!
This game is fuuuuunnnnnnnnn with friends and has mods to make the game just that more insane. As a massive fan of mods its great. 
**Dont** buy this get Left 4 Dead 2. There is very little reason to get this when L4D2 exists.
Also as of me making this many of the developers of the left 4 dead Franchise have made another game that is similar to left 4 dead. I have not played it but for those who care that game is more "Modern" if your into that.

Could the zombies run any faster. wait a second they are zombies? I thought they were Marathon runners. 
Anyone who wants to change the Classic Romero Zombies and swap them with Speeding Sickos that B-line you from all angles all the time should be shot in their forehead with a nailgun over and over lest they turn into a runner zombie and try to B-line you. 

How can you call this a Zombie game dude.  Yes there are special monsters as well but those are the only moments when this game feels like a horror game. Other times its a first person runner.
This game is so intense and fun to play, I just started playing today and I'm already addicted :D
Excelente juego. M√°s si lo juegas con amigos, su modo campa√±a espectacular. Recomendado, por si desean jugarlo

The first of this Trinity of games (Left 4 Dead, Left 4 Dead 2, and Back 4 Blood), this is a great game if you enjoy that zombie survival horror game. It's a lot of fun, and half the fun is the special zombies mixed in that have special abilities and want to give you a reallllllly special time. This is a Steam/Valve Classic.

Recomendado si tienes con quien jugarlo. Jugar solo es aburrido y actualmente me cuesta bastante encontrar partida online. Por el resto, juego sencillo y directo, perfecto para desahogarse, sin complicarse en sus mec√°nicas jugables.
